channel.title: Introduction on Dhanya Bhardwaj
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Dhanya Bhardwaj

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: The Letter # It was the usual sunny day in London. The streets were filled with people and the shops were out of clothes, food, furniture etc. Nearby, a small house was covered with thornes and ivy looked like it was abandoned .beside the abandoned house was a place almost like a mansion just a bit smaller it was all white and had a beautiful garden in the middle of the garden was a statue of a little boy with a crown on his head.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction # This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.
